extension.name: Multi Upload Field
extension.description: Allows multiple files to be uploaded to the same field.

releases.release: - [#36](https://github.com/symphonists/multiuploadfield/issues/36) Fixes for meta data and empty files
- Fix for Symphony 2.6.7+ (#33) with proper implementation of buildSortingSQL and prepareReadableValue
- Added upload visual feedback - Bug fixes
- Updates for Symphony 2.6 - Added file extensions to the XML output

- [#21](https://github.com/symphonists/multiuploadfield/issues/21) Sanity checks to ensure data is an array - [#18](https://github.com/symphonists/multiuploadfield/issues/18)/[#20](https://github.com/symphonists/multiuploadfield/issues/20) Handle partial deletions/additions of files - [#12](https://github.com/symphonists/multiuploadfield/issues/12) Allow error messages to be displayed in the publish panel
- Fixed inline errors - Added German translation
